page.title: 19OUR LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: {THE HINCKLEY TIMES Hinckley has its own{newspaper published every Friday costing 18p. The Hinckley Times concentrates on local news and items of interest. Often the main feature is a local tragedy or an event in the area such as a strike. The paper always includes reports on local shows, fetes, sport, crime, successes and council reports. Advertising is an important part of the paper providing the major financing of the paper. The paper is produced at the offices at Brunel Rd. where seven reporters collect and type the news to be selected by the editor. The paper size is decided by the amount of advertising.The manager sets out the adverts in page lyouts then surrounds them with relevant news printing 70,000 words of news.
